title: Pleasant Homes
address: Edappally kanagarappady Road, Junction, near Kangrappady, Ernakulam, Kerala 682021, India

reviews.review_text: Very nice property good for family stay

The best stay in the busy city, at city vicinity, the place is excellently managed and kept clean. The highlight is its surrounding,  nearby a big town all basics are available. The staff and owner himself very helpfull, very supportive for family.we surely recommend this place for a peaceful stay in kochi city with ample parking space.

Very good rooms and parking space is best part, gated parking availability. The rooms are clean and very hostile host.
100 percent supportive.

Our stay at pleasant homes is remarkable, as while  during our stay for about a week , we had a nice time in Ernakulam, had a peace stay and quiet environment.
My family had safe stay while I was out for my office. Nearby all essentials available.

Sure recommended place to stay a bit from busy city, though easily commuting.
Good service
Poor Service not recommended
Worst behaviour from the service staff.
Service is bad.

Kashtam thanne muthalaali
Poor service

Location & Room is good - service and coordination from the staffs (Riyas) is extremely poor.

Rooms are not allotting on priority simply delaying.
Floors are sticky
Poor coordination
Very nice place to stay with family. Good location, good parking, safe,also need to mention the support from staff and owner.

We can tell you, this will be a very great place where can stay with your family, very good hospitality and owner is very helpful.
The place is very close to a small town with hotels and neady things.
Over all surely recomended place. 👍🏻

വളരെ നല്ല രീതിയിൽ താമസിക്കാനായി പറ്റിയ ഒരു സ്ഥലമാണ് ഫാമിലിയുമായി താമസിക്കുന്നതിന് വളരെ സന്തോഷകരമായ ഒരു താമസമാണ് ഞങ്ങൾക്ക് അവിടെ ഉണ്ടായിരുന്നത് അവിടത്തെ സ്റ്റാഫിന്റെ സഹകരണവും മറ്റുള്ളവരുടെ എല്ലാ സപ്പോർട്ടും വളരെ പ്രശംസനീയമാണ്

Well maintained place and good hospitality team. we like the stay at pleasant home very much, hospitality is very well. the place is clean and impressive. the staff staff behaviour is very kind and supportive. A good place to consider for a safe stay with family

Nice place to stay with family, we also recommend this place for out families and friends.
Good support and cleanliness.

One of best accommodation stayed recently, good hospitality, nice room and ambiance.
Sure stay property.
Recom👌
Good experience room was good

The best place and it is budget friendly and well maintained. I would say the best service you would ever receive. Go for it if you would like a neat and clean place to stay with enough parking space.
Nice place, very supportive staff and owner. The place is located a bit from busy street but is easily accessible to city, all transports and all. Liked this place very much surely recommend
We stayed in pleasant group both hotels, it was really a good experience, We like the helpful nature of the owner and staff. I am surely recommending worth stay.

Very good rooms, we stayed here with family and was a very good experience for having nice rooms,good staff and area also.
Surely mark this place as our recommend place to stay in ernakulam👍

Good rooms, good staff, wonderful full stay.
The place is pleasing and surely recommending.
The place has safe parking, and good shops nearby.

Nice rooms and surroundings, the place is very silent and clean.
We stayed for more than a week, for hospital purpose. Happy to say the place is surely a family place and with good host.
Very best wishes to pleasant homes
Bahuth acha place to stay. Recommended
Verry good
nice room ....
Nice place,loved to stay here, impressive

Very nice accommodation, good for family, I liked the stay in pleasant homes with my family. Stayed for 2 days, near by a good town area, with all available shops and market for fruits available.
Surely recommended for families.

hotel_analysis.summary: Pleasant Homes generally enjoys positive reviews for its clean and comfortable accommodations, peaceful location, and friendly staff. Recent feedback points to service inconsistencies and a lack of dining options as primary areas for improvement, suggesting a need for enhanced service training and expanded food services. The hotel benefits from high scores in cleanliness, value for money, and its convenient location, but must address service quality and online engagement to further boost guest satisfaction.

room_quality: Rooms are noted for being clean and well-maintained, with ample space and pleasing ambiance.
Very good rooms and parking space is best part
The rooms are clean and very hostile host
common_praises: Guests frequently praise the room cleanliness, comfort, and maintenance.
The hotel is considered suitable for families, offering a peaceful environment.
suggestions: Consider adding more amenities in rooms to enhance comfort
Ensure maintenance is consistently high to prevent guests from finding faults

strengths: Staff is generally described as friendly and supportive, with good hospitality.
Good service, especially noted by multiple guests
Staff and owner are very helpful and supportive
weaknesses: Several reviews highlight poor service and coordination from staff, specifically mentioning delays and unprofessional behavior from some staff members.
Occasional reports of poor service need addressing
suggestions: Conduct service training for staff to improve coordination and response times.
Implement a protocol for prioritizing room assignments and improve check-in efficiency.
Implement regular training sessions to maintain high service standards
Address any service-related complaints promptly to prevent recurrence

praised_features: Good parking facilities and proximity to shops are highlighted.
suggestions: Consider adding recreational amenities such as a gym or pool to enhance guest experience

food_and_dining.restaurant_quality: No specific feedback available on dining quality, indicating potential need for varied and advertised food services.
food_and_dining.breakfast_feedback: No specific feedback on breakfast offerings.
suggestions: Consider offering a complimentary breakfast or coffee service to enhance guest experience.
Encourage guests to provide feedback on dining experiences to identify strengths and areas for improvement

positive_aspects: The hotel is located near a small town, with good access to shops and essential services.
The location is considered peaceful yet accessible to the city.
Located near a big town with essentials easily accessible
suggestions: Provide more detailed information on nearby attractions in promotional materials to highlight the benefits of the location

value_for_money.perceived_value: The hotel is widely considered to be budget-friendly, offering good value for money.
positive_factors: Clean rooms, good location, and helpful staff are perceived as providing good value.
Peaceful stay with easy commuting options
suggestions: Maintain competitive pricing and occasionally offer promotional packages to attract more guests
Enhance online engagement by responding to reviews and actively updating potential guests about improvements and offerings.
Enhance online presence by actively engaging with guests on social media platforms
Ensure the hotel website is updated with accurate information about amenities and services

top_improvement_priorities.suggestion: Implement regular training sessions to maintain consistent service quality
top_improvement_priorities.potential_impact: High impact on guest satisfaction and reviews by improving service consistency.

top_improvement_priorities.suggestion: Increase social media interaction and ensure website accuracy
top_improvement_priorities.potential_impact: Moderate impact by potentially increasing bookings through improved online engagement and presence.

top_improvement_priorities.issue: Lack of dining options mentioned in reviews.
top_improvement_priorities.suggestion: Introduce a basic dining service or partnerships with local restaurants for guest convenience.
top_improvement_priorities.potential_impact: Increased guest satisfaction through convenience and perceived value.

top_improvement_priorities.suggestion: Add a gym or pool to attract more guests seeking these features
top_improvement_priorities.potential_impact: Moderate impact on attracting more family and leisure guests.

top_improvement_priorities.suggestion: Enhance room amenities to improve guest comfort, such as adding tea/coffee makers or improving Wi-Fi connectivity
top_improvement_priorities.potential_impact: Moderate impact on guest comfort and satisfaction.
